channel.title: Looking for 508 quests!
channel.description:
Hi!
I'm trying to build a private server for me and some close friends (About 5-6 of us) and we want to have a few quests to complete in this server and have some great banter :P Do you know where I can get some quests for my Davidscape server? I'd be very grateful if you could provide us with some good quests, even those that come directly from Runescape itself. I'd like at least 15 different quests in my server, if not more. I kinda wanted to start an RSPS so that I could play privately with some friends, I didn't know the servers didn't contain any quests. Without quests, Runescape has no lore and it gets a little boring :(
Thanks in advance! :D

item.title: Looking for 508 quests!
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

Sir Nuggets:

Checked the server out and couldn’t find a way to start the server, the “run” file didn’t have a file type or anything that my windows could recognize.

Probably need to use an IDE like Eclipse Or Netbeans…
Or, create the run.bat yourself.

Read full topic

item.description:

Yeah I don’t really have the knowledge to do so.
Are there any 400-599 versions of runescape that have a release with quests?
I don’t really mind having a later/earlier version to play on.

item.title: Looking for 508 quests!
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

Afaik there’s no release that has quests in it for a 508… If there is I haven’t seen it. I don’t even see 508 tutorials anymore.

Honestly your best bet would be to write them yourself… And if you don’t have the knowledge to do so, to do without.

Read full topic
